lead_paragraph: The Carolina Panthers will go to San Francisco favored by more than a field goal to win the Super Bowl for the first time in franchise history.

headline.print_headline: Panthers Open Up 4-Point Favorites in Vegas Over Broncos
headline.main: Panthers Open Up 4-Point Favorites in Vegas Over Broncos
